Plot Generic Heatmap

Source: R/analytics.R
plot_heatmap.Rd

Create a heatmap from any matrix-like data.

Usage

plot_heatmap(data, x, y, value, title = "Heatmap", theme_dark = FALSE)

Arguments

data

Data frame with three columns: x, y, value

x

Column name for x-axis

y

Column name for y-axis

value

Column name for color values

title

Chart title

theme_dark

Use dark theme (default: FALSE)

Value

A ggplot object

On this page
